org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.operators.matching.single.cypher.pojos

Class EmbeddingMetaData

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.operators.matching.single.cypher.pojos.EmbeddingMetaData
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class EmbeddingMetaData
extends Object
implements Serializable
    This class stores meta data information about a data set of Embedding objects. An Embedding stores identifiers (single or path) and properties associated with query elements. The meta data contains a mapping between query variables and the column index storing the associated element/path identifier. Furthermore, the meta data object contains a mapping between property values associated to property keys at query elements.
    See Also:

        public EmbeddingMetaData(Map<org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair<String,EmbeddingMetaData.EntryType>,Integer> entryMapping,

                         Map<String,ExpandDirection> directionMapping)
        Initializes a new EmbeddingMetaData object from the given mappings
        Parameters:
        entryMapping - maps variables to embedding entries
        propertyMapping - maps variable-propertyKey pairs to embedding property data entries
        directionMapping - maps (path) variables to their direction

        entryType - entry type

      • getEntryColumn

        public int getEntryColumn(String variable)
        Returns the position of the embedding entry corresponding to the given variable. The method checks if the variable is mapped to a vertex or an edge entry.
        Parameters:
        variable - variable name
        Returns:
        the position of the corresponding embedding entry
        Throws:
        NoSuchElementException - if there is no column mapped to the specified variable

      • containsEntryColumn

        public boolean containsEntryColumn(String variable)
        Checks if the specified variable is mapped to a column in the embedding.
        Parameters:
        variable - query variable
        Returns:
        true, iff the variable is mapped to a column

      • getEntryType

        public EmbeddingMetaData.EntryType getEntryType(String variable)
        Returns the entry type of the given variable.
        Parameters:
        variable - query variable
        Returns:
        Entry type of the referred entry
        Throws:
        NoSuchElementException - if there is no column mapped to the specified variable

      • setPropertyColumn

        public void setPropertyColumn(String variable,
                              String propertyKey,
                              int index)
        Inserts or updates the mapping of a Variable-PropertyKey pair to the position of the corresponding PropertyValue within the embeddings propertyData array
        Parameters:
        variable - variable name
        propertyKey - property key
        index - position of the property value within the propertyData array

      • getPropertyColumn

        public int getPropertyColumn(String variable,
                             String propertyKey)
        Returns the position of the PropertyValue corresponding to the Variable-PropertyKey-Pair.
        Parameters:
        variable - variable name
        propertyKey - property key
        Returns:
        the position of the corresponding property value
        Throws:
        NoSuchElementException - if there is no column mapped to the given variable and key

      • setDirection

        public void setDirection(String variable,
                         ExpandDirection direction)
        Inserts or updates the direction for the specified path variable.
        Parameters:
        variable - variable associated with a variable length path
        direction - direction in which the path is stored in the embedding

      • getDirection

        public ExpandDirection getDirection(String variable)
        Returns the direction in which the path associated with the specified variable is stored in the embedding.
        Parameters:
        variable - variable associated with a variable length path
        Returns:
        direction
        Throws:
        NoSuchElementException - if the variable has no assigned direction

      • getVariables

        public List<String> getVariables()
        Returns a list of all variable that are contained in the embedding. The order of the variables is determined by their position within the embedding.
        Returns:
        a list of all variables

      • getVariablesWithProperties

        public List<String> getVariablesWithProperties()
        Returns a list of all variables that are contained in the embedding and have at least one associated property column.
        Returns:
        a list of all variables with at least one property column

      • getVertexVariables

        public List<String> getVertexVariables()
        Returns a list of variables that are contained in the embedding and refer to vertices. The order of the variables is determined by their position within the embedding.
        Returns:
        a list of all vertex variables

      • getEdgeVariables

        public List<String> getEdgeVariables()
        Returns a list of variables that are contained in the embedding and refer to edges. The order of the variables is determined by their position within the embedding.
        Returns:
        a list of all edge variables

      • getPathVariables

        public List<String> getPathVariables()
        Returns a list of variables that are contained in the embedding and refer to paths. The order of the variables is determined by their position within the embedding.
        Returns:
        a list of all path variables

      • getPropertyKeys

        public List<String> getPropertyKeys(String variable)
        Returns a list of all property keys that are contained in the embedding regarding the specified variable. The order of the keys is determined by the position of the property value in the embedding.
        Parameters:
        variable - variable name
        Returns:
        a list of all property keys contained in the embedding
